Our Services

Premium furnished apartment solutions for every need. From corporate housing to short-term stays, we've got you covered.

Corporate Housing

Fully furnished apartments for business travelers and relocating employees. Flexible lease terms from 1 month to 1 year.

  • All utilities included
  • High-speed WiFi
  • Housekeeping service
  • 24/7 support

Short-term Rentals

Premium furnished apartments for short stays. Perfect for vacations, temporary relocations, or home renovations.

  • Minimum 28 nights
  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Premium locations
  • Instant booking

Property Management

Full-service property management for landlords. We handle everything from marketing to maintenance.

  • Professional photography
  • Tenant screening
  • Rent collection
  • Maintenance coordination

Concierge Services

Personalized concierge services to make your stay exceptional. From airport transfers to grocery delivery.

  • Airport pickup
  • Grocery delivery
  • Restaurant reservations
  • Local recommendations

Flexible Leasing

Lease terms that fit your schedule. No long-term commitments or hidden fees.

  • Month-to-month options
  • No hidden fees
  • Easy renewal
  • Early termination available

Global Network

Access to premium furnished apartments in major cities across North America and beyond.

  • Toronto
  • Vancouver
  • Montreal
  • New York
  • San Francisco

Ready to get started?

Contact us today to learn more about our services and find your perfect home.
